title: a
text: the frequency to assess risk to organizational operations, organizational assets, and individuals is defined

title: b
text: risk to organizational operations, organizational assets, and individuals resulting from the operation of an organizational system that processes, stores, or transmits CUI is assessed with the defined frequency

title: a
text: the frequency to scan for vulnerabilities in organizational systems and applications is defined

title: b
text: vulnerability scans are performed on organizational systems with the defined frequency

title: c
text: vulnerability scans are performed on applications with the defined frequency

title: d
text: vulnerability scans are performed on organizational systems when new vulnerabilities are identified

title: e
text: vulnerability scans are performed on applications when new vulnerabilities are identified

title: a
text: vulnerabilities are identified

title: b
text: vulnerabilities are remediated in accordance with risk assessments

title: a
text: the frequency of security control assessments is defined

title: b
text: security controls are assessed with the defined frequency to determine if the controls are effective in their application

title: a
text: deficiencies and vulnerabilities to be addressed by the plan of action are identified

title: b
text: a plan of action is developed to correct identified deficiencies and reduce or eliminate identified vulnerabilities

title: c
text: the plan of action is implemented to correct identified deficiencies and reduce or eliminate identified vulnerabilities

title: a
text: security controls are monitored on an ongoing basis to ensure the continued effectiveness of those controls

title: a
text: a system security plan is developed

title: b
text: the system boundary is described and documented in the system security plan

title: c
text: the system environment of operation is described and documented in the system security plan

title: d
text: the security requirements identified and approved by the designated authority as non-applicable are identified

title: e
text: the method of security requirement implementation is described and documented in the system security plan

title: f
text: the relationship with or connection to other systems is described and documented in the system security plan

title: g
text: the frequency to update the system security plan is defined

title: h
text: system security plan is updated with the defined frequency
